item.title: Fallen tree, 7th August
item.description:
On the river walk, from Barnes cray rd, its Crayford a tree has fallen. It is right across the walk way. Lots of elderly and disabled people us the footpath, today I can across I gentleman in a wheelchair that couldn't get passed. This has been like this for a few days. Its about half way down the footpath, going towards Crayford.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Barnes Cray Road, Barnes Cray, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Dear Simon Priscilla hackney council manager can you please address this issue of people hanging their washing over this stair balustrates as this is a fire risk and health and safety to other residents please do your duty don't be lazy. Remember you're here to serve residents, 7th August
item.description:
Simon Priscilla housing officer Hackney Council turning a blind eye to fire safety concerns raised by residents of other residents hanging washing over staircase rails people can trip and hurt themselves in an emergency do your duty Simon.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Homerton High Street, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Hackney council discrimination Hackney council and hackney housing officers over bannister houses residents our discrimination against irish travelers as simon percella is manger of my housing officer they refuse to do any works in my home and refuses to rehouse me to a safe home for my family.Simon Priscilla incompetent manager is a self-centered person who only cares about his self. item.title: Tree needs to be pruned on wood church close, 7th August

item.title: Outside the entrance to the UCL main building., 7th August
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Gower Street, Fitzrovia, London
Report on FixMyStreet
